## How Rotation Works

1. **Alphabetical by last name** for meeting lead
2. **Research presentations** scheduled based on project milestones
3. **Swap requests**: Post in Teams at least 1 week ahead
4. **Absences**: Notify Dr. Rashid and find a replacement

## Meeting Lead Checklist

### Before the Meeting (by Tuesday 5pm)

- [ ] Create Discussion thread: `Lab Meeting - YYYY-MM-DD`
- [ ] Copy [agenda template](meetings.qmd#agenda-template) into thread
- [ ] Confirm presenter(s) and update agenda
- [ ] Post reminder in Teams `#general` channel

### Day Before (Wednesday)

- [ ] Check that agenda items have been added
- [ ] Send final reminder for contributions
- [ ] Prepare any standing items or announcements

### During the Meeting

- [ ] Start on time
- [ ] Check off attendees in the thread
- [ ] Keep time for each agenda item
- [ ] Capture key discussion points
- [ ] Identify action items as they arise
- [ ] End with action item summary

### After the Meeting (by Thursday EOD)

- [ ] Update Discussion thread with meeting notes
- [ ] Add all action items with assignees and due dates
- [ ] @mention people assigned to action items
- [ ] Update parking lot items
- [ ] Confirm next week's lead
